text: Arthur Henry Adams (4 September 1891 – 12 July 1969) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the South Melbourne Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL).Holmesby, Russell & Main, Jim (2007). The Encyclopedia of AFL Footballers. 7th ed.
